settings.editor: Away from the hustle and bustle of Dubai is the majestic Sheikh Zayed Mosque. desertdaytravels Tourism presents the Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque Tour from Dubai which will indeed have you stepping into a calming world of spirituality. Firstly, the pristine whiteness of the grand structure makes you descend into peace and tranquillity. Secondly, admire this stunning architectural wonder where you can understand the culture and religious values of the Emiratis. So, book Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque tickets with desertdaytravels.

settings.editor:
What to expect 

The Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque has a beautiful milky white edifice and is an iconic landmark in Abu Dhabi tours attractions. The interiors as well as exteriors of this amazingly beautiful mosque are mesmerisingly beautiful. A bilingual guide possessing a licence fills you in with detailed information about the mosque. Inspired by Ottoman architecture, a large courtyard has been made that can accommodate as many as 30,000 people. There are close to 76 columns inside the mosque’s hall that are a fine specimen of a lovely blend of Islamic and North African architecture. There are 99 names of Allah engraved on the Qibla Wall that faces Mecca. Explore this place with desertdaytravels's Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque Tour from Dubai.

One of the most important things to remember is the timings that differ from day to day, Saturday to Thursday it is 9 AM to 10 AM and on Fridays, there are 2 slots 9 AM to 12 PM and 3 PM to 10 PM. So, To visit the majestic mosque, you can book a Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque ticket online for a seamless experience. The Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque ticket grants you access to one of the largest and most beautiful mosques in the world, renowned for its stunning architecture and serene ambience. You can also take this tour with the Abu Dhabi city tour.

About the Mosque

Envisioned by Sheikh Zayed bin Sultan Al Nahyan, the United Arab Emirates’ founding father, the Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque welcomes visitors from every faith and all walks of life. Moreover, the construction of the Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque was a work of collaboration with Iran. Furthermore, it involved skilled craftsmen from various nations. Additionally, Iranian craftsmen who hand-wove the world’s largest carpet in the prayer hall deserve a special mention.

Certainly, a major attraction inside the Mosque is the massive gold chandelier from the house of Swarovski. Especially, the mosaic work on the surface of the marble in the courtyard is breathtaking as are the pools with crystal clear water. You’ll see reflections of columns that fit with amethyst and jasper on the surface of the pool waters, which will make you realise how much effort was put into the building of the mosque. Rising into the skies to a height of 106 metres are the 4 spectacular minarets.

The Facilities at the Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque

  • Parking your car here is not an issue at all since there’s enough space just beside the mosque.
  • There are coolers serving free cold water.
  • You can enjoy refreshments at the Coffee Club Café.

The Dress Code for the Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque Tour

Women should fully cover themselves. For this, they must come in long and loose clothing. They shall also have to cover their heads as long as they are in the mosque’s premises. Men need to cover their tattoos (if any) and shoulders. They shall also have to cover everything above their knees. You can not enter if you fail to adhere to the above dress code. Women can take hijabs and abayas on rent before they enter the mosque’s premises.

How to Reach Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque?

You have two options to reach the mosque:

  • You can surely hire a cab from the Abu Dhabi airport which is around 19 kilometres away. Also, if you are visiting with your family and friends we recommend a round trip.
  • There are bus services also. However, there’s no bus stop for the mosque. You’ll need to get off at the Zayed Sports City and from there, you’ll need to take a cab or rent a car. You can contact desertdaytravels Tourism for all your hassle free transportation services needs. The Zayed Sports City is 3.1 kilometres away from the Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque.

Important Points to Note

  • You can not carry any food or beverage into the mosque complex
  • You should avoid any public show of affection
  • You are not to take any photographs inside the Mosque
  • You are to remove your shoes before entering the mosque premises
  • While free guided tours are available, we suggest that you hire a private guide who can share more detailed information about the mosque

Other places to check out in Abu Dhabi are the Louvre Museum, Qasr Al Watan, Snow Park Abu Dhabi, and the most famous Ferrari World Abu Dhabi.

FAQs

Q. What are the visiting hours for the Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque?

The mosque is open Saturday to Thursday from 9 AM to 10 PM. On Fridays, it is open in two slots: 9 AM to 12 PM and 3 PM to 10 PM.

Q. Is there a dress code for visiting the SZG Mosque?

Yes, women must wear long, loose clothing and cover their heads. Men should cover their shoulders and knees.

Q. Can I take photographs inside?

However, you can't take photos inside the mosque itself. But you can click on the exterior area.

Q. Is there any requirement for the Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque ticket?

Entry to the mosque is free of charge. However, there might be fees for special guided tours.

Q. How can I book a guided tour of the mosque?

You can book a guided tour through the Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque Center’s official website or tour operators like desertdaytravels Tourism.

Q. What are the facilities available at the Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque Center?

The mosque offers ample parking, free cold water coolers, and a café called the Coffee Club for refreshments.

Q. What is the significance of the Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque Center?

The Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque Center is a cultural and religious landmark, envisioned by the UAE’s founding father, and built with contributions from craftsmen around the world. It showcases Islamic architecture and values.

Q. Can I visit other attractions in Abu Dhabi during the Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque Tour?

Yes, you can plan to visit other attractions like the Louvre Museum Abu Dhabi, Snow Park, and Qasr Al Watan.

Q. What should I know before going on the SZG Mosque Tour?

Make sure to adhere to the dress code, avoid public displays of affection, and do not carry food or beverages into the mosque. Don't forget to remove your shoes before entering the premises.
